Buses leave at least every half hour from the terminal at the Vila´s main square, and can be hailed anywhere en route. R$ 3-4, 1 - 1,5 hours.
On weekends and holidays there is a daily boat connection.
Don't forget to visit the Praia do Paraiso, a beautiful and typical Amazon River beach!
